00037 #include "Interfaces.h"
00038 
00039 class SceneNode;
00040 
00041 class TeapotController : public IMouseHandler, public IKeyboardHandler
00042 {
00043 protected:
00044         BYTE                                    m_bKey[256];                    // Which keys are up and down
00045         shared_ptr<SceneNode>   m_object;
00046 
00047 public:
00048         TeapotController(shared_ptr<SceneNode> object, float initialYaw, float initialPitch);
00049         void SetObject(shared_ptr<SceneNode> newObject);
00050 
00051         void OnUpdate(DWORD const elapsedMs);
00052 
00053 public:
00054         bool VOnMouseMove(const CPoint &mousePos) { return true; }
00055         bool VOnLButtonDown(const CPoint &mousePos);
00056         bool VOnLButtonUp(const CPoint &mousePos) { return true; }
00057         bool VOnRButtonDown(const CPoint &) { return false; }
00058         bool VOnRButtonUp(const CPoint &) { return false; }
00059 
00060         bool VOnKeyDown(const BYTE c) { m_bKey[c] = true; return true; }
00061         bool VOnKeyUp(const BYTE c) { m_bKey[c] = false; return true; }
00062 };
